products.desc: Observer Ward (also known as obs) is a Basic item purchasable from the Consumables section at the Home Shop. Because of the power they provide through map control, their stock in the shop is limited to a maximum of 4, with an initial stock of 2. It takes 135 seconds to replenish 1 stock.
Blade of Alacrity is a Basic Item purchasable from the Attributes section of the Home Shop. It is a component of Yasha, Diffusal Blade, and Aghanim's Scepter.
Claymore is a Basic item purchasable from the Armaments section of the Home Shop.
Ghost Scepter is a basic item purchasable from the Arcane section of the Home Shop. Can be upgraded into an Ethereal Blade.

Boots of Travel is an item bought at the Home Shop. Boots of Travel can be upgraded to level 2 by buying the recipe again, allowing the holder to teleport directly to allied heroes, and increasing the movement speed bonus to 35%.
Holy Locket is an item purchasable at the Home Shop.

Shiva's Guard (also known as Shiva's) is a powerful item that works great on many carry and support heroes that need high Intelligence stats. It is a situational item for the late game that can cripple the entire enemy team, giving your team an edge in battle
Butterfly is one of the strongest agility items for a late game carry.
Eye of Skadi (also known as Skadi) is an excellent late game item providing high stat gain.
Sacred Relic is a Secret item purchasable from the Secret Shop.
